Package model

Class BuildingCompany

java.lang.Object
model.BuildingCompany
All Implemented Interfaces:
BuildingCompanyModel
public class BuildingCompany extends Object implements BuildingCompanyModel
Represents a building company that manages ongoing and finished projects, generates reports, and interacts with file persistence.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BuildingCompany()
    Constructs a BuildingCompany, initializing project lists and reading data from XML files.
